mapper.select: SELECT userId, ct.quantity, ct.cartNum, ct.option2Num, op1.option2Name, ct.option2Num2, op2.option2Name option2Name2, (SELECT NVL(MAX(deliveryFee),0) FROM cart ct JOIN item i ON ct.itemNum = i.itemNum WHERE userId = #{userId}) deliveryFee, NVL(itemPoint, 0) itemPoint, mainImage, ct.itemNum, itemName, i.itemPrice + op2.extraPrice itemPrice, (i.itemPrice + op2.extraPrice) * (NVL(discount,0) * 0.01) disPrice, (i.itemPrice + op2.extraPrice) * (100-NVL(discount,0)) * 0.01 finalPrice, NVL(totalStock, 0) totalStock FROM cart ct JOIN item i ON ct.itemNum = i.itemNum LEFT JOIN option2 op1 ON ct.option2Num = op1.option2Num LEFT JOIN option2 op2 ON ct.option2Num2 = op2.option2Num LEFT JOIN itemStock it ON it.itemNum = ct.itemNum WHERE userId = #{userId} ORDER BY ct.cartNum DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE regDate + 15 < SYSDATE
